column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This was the first time my husband and I visited. We were both completely impressed with the customer service
column2: vibe and the food! We really were blown away thanks to Jose and the 3 other gentlemen that came around to check in on us. Jose really took the time to explain the restaurants story
column3: the rare selection of Bosscat whiskey
column4: which we tried and it was amazing! We even were given a tour of the whiskey room! We have a lot of experience with great restaurants having lived in San Francisco
column6: New York and Seattle. We were just visiting today but will definitely be back and have already spread the word. Keep up the great work!
